additional-notes: Active renewals are recorded beginning in the 1966 July-December CCE volume, but the earliest active renewed contribution record mentioning this periodical is in the 1967 July-December volume.

The renewals above are all the active renewals that specifically mention this magazine.  However, this magazine frequently reprinted and translated pieces from other publications, some of which may still be under copyright.   We have not systematically checked the copyrights of the original publications.
